AK8963_MISSION_REV.title: Mission Revision
AK8963_MISSION_REV.description: An application version number consists of four parts: major version number, minor version number, revision number and mission specific revision number. The mission specific revision number is defined here and the other parts are defined in 'ak8963_version.h'

AK8963_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.title: Scheduler pipe depth
AK8963_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.description: Pipe depth for the Scheduler pipe.

AK8963_SCH_PIPE_NAME.title: Scheduler pipe name
AK8963_SCH_PIPE_NAME.description: Pipe name for the Scheduler pipe.
AK8963_SCH_PIPE_NAME.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_SCH_PIPE_PEND_TIME.title: Scheduler pipe pend time
AK8963_SCH_PIPE_PEND_TIME.description: The SB pend behavior type for the Scheduler pipe.
AK8963_SCH_PIPE_PEND_TIME.limits: One of: CFE_SB_POLL, CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, or the number of milliseconds to wait for a new message (recommended). Note, using CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER may cause an unresponsive application if no messages arrive on this pipe.

AK8963_PARAM_PIPE_DEPTH.title: Parameter Pipe Depth
AK8963_PARAM_PIPE_DEPTH.description: Pipe depth for the params pipe.

AK8963_PARAM_PIPE_NAME.title: Parameter Pipe Name
AK8963_PARAM_PIPE_NAME.description: Pipe name for the params pipe.
AK8963_PARAM_PIPE_NAME.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_WAKEUP_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.title: WAKEUP Message Limit
AK8963_WAKEUP_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.description: The number of WAKEUP messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.
AK8963_WAKEUP_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.limits: Minimum of 1, max limited to CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH-1.  Note the AK8963_WAKEUP_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT and AK8963_SEND_HK_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT must be less than AK8963_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

AK8963_SEND_HK_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.title: SEND_HK Message Limit
AK8963_SEND_HK_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.description: The number of SEND_HK messages to reserve on the Scheduler pipe.
AK8963_SEND_HK_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT.limits: Minimum of 1, max of CFE_SB_MAX_PIPE_DEPTH.  Note the AK8963_WAKEUP_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT and AK8963_SEND_HK_MID_MAX_MSG_COUNT must be less than AK8963_SCH_PIPE_DEPTH.

AK8963_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH.title: Command Pipe Depth
AK8963_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH.description: Pipe depth for the command pipe.
AK8963_CMD_PIPE_DEPTH.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_CMD_PIPE_NAME.title: Command Pipe Name
AK8963_CMD_PIPE_NAME.description: Pipe name for the Command pipe.
AK8963_CMD_PIPE_NAME.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_DATA_PIPE_DEPTH.title: Data Pipe Depth
AK8963_DATA_PIPE_DEPTH.description: Pipe depth for the data pipe.
AK8963_DATA_PIPE_DEPTH.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_DATA_PIPE_NAME.title: Data Pipe Name
AK8963_DATA_PIPE_NAME.description: Pipe name for the Data pipe.
AK8963_DATA_PIPE_NAME.limits: Note, this name must fit in OS_MAX_API_NAME.

AK8963_CONFIG_TABLE_FILENAME.title: Config Table Filename
AK8963_CONFIG_TABLE_FILENAME.limits: The length of each string, including the NULL terminator cannot exceed the #OS_MAX_PATH_LEN value.

AK8963_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_MSEC.title: Startup Timeout
AK8963_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_MSEC.description: The timeout value, in milliseconds, to wait for ES application startup sync.
AK8963_STARTUP_TIMEOUT_MSEC.limits: This parameter must be at least 1000 (ms).
